Text: Works fine but seems to make corrupt settings file (Traktor DJ Studio 3 Settings.xml) when "syncro start" is checked in the prefs. Have to replace this settings file with a backup or the default setup for Traktor to start up again. This might be an issue on my mac only. (PPC Powerbook OS 10.4.9)

If you experience my problem mentioned above you can open the file "Traktor DJ Studio 3 Settings.xml" with TextEdit end set the Value in this line from 1 to 0 and then save:



And you're up an running with traktor 3 without loosing your prefs.
